import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { RootState } from '../redux/store'; import { addPost } from '../redux/postsSlice'; import './FeedPage.css'; import imgProfilee from '../assets/pp.jpg'; const FeedPage: React.FC = () => { const [newPost, setNewPost] = useState(''); const posts = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.posts.posts); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleCreatePost = () => { if (newPost.trim()) { dispatch(addPost({ content: newPost, image: '', tags: '' })); setNewPost(''); } }; return (
